comment: LeAnne loves Richard and she loves her fans. She's SO REAL! She puts the REAL in ! Love her & her of other women! TY! Xoxo
amr:
# ::snt LeAnne loves Richard and she loves her fans. She's SO REAL! She puts the REAL in ! Love her & her of other women! TY! Xoxo
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (l / love-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "LeAnne"))
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Richard")))
            :op2 (l2 / love-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (f / fan
                        :poss p)))
      :snt2 (r / real-04
            :ARG1 (s / she)
            :degree (s2 / so))
      :snt3 (p3 / put-01
            :ARG0 (s3 / she)
            :ARG1 (p4 / person
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / real-04))
            :ARG2 (ii / inside))
      :snt4 (a2 / and
            :op1 (l3 / love-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (s4 / she)
                        :op2 (p5 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "amp"))))
            :op2 (l4 / love-01
                  :ARG1 (w / woman
                        :mod (o / other)))
            :mode expressive)
      :snt5 (p6 / person
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "xoxo")))
